Html:
Hi,
i developed a new solution and copied files in each project.

my projects' names were different.

Now i am getting almost 64 errors when i try to build the application.

see below.

i uploaded the whole project at here for more convenience.

Please look into it.
Thanks you soo much buddies. My problem has been solved. :)

First, I would strongly suggest to not just pull the entire source into your own project. You'll be missing out on ModernUI fixes and new features (or you'll need to apply them manually). And second, when you choose to do this, you must retain all copyright and trademark notices as per the license.

The build error indicates that you are missing the XmlnsDefinition attributes. Looking at your source, that seems to be the case.
